name: Sophia Chen

bio: Specializing in machine learning with a focus on NLP applications. Completed a summer internship at Google developing sentiment analysis algorithms. Seeking opportunities to apply AI solutions to real-world business problems.

bio: Completing dissertation on predictive analytics for market volatility. Published in top journals and developed an open-source forecasting tool. Exploring roles in quantitative analysis and algorithmic trading.

bio: Conducting research on reinforcement learning algorithms with applications in automated trading. Previously interned at JPMorgan Chase in their quantitative strategies division. Transitioning to industry roles in AI or quantitative finance.

bio: Recent graduate now working on Azure cloud infrastructure. Completed three internships during undergrad at startups and tech giants. Here to share my journey and help students navigate the tech recruitment landscape.
